name: mist-aws
description: Mist database provisioning on AWS (RDS, Aurora, DynamoDB)
notes: Tested with Mist v2.x on AWS RDS, Aurora, and DynamoDB
Catches configuration errors early: VPC, security groups, IAM permissions
15s delay captures full AWS error messages including request IDs
120s idle timeout catches AWS API throttling and long provisioning pauses
False positive occurred with AWS warning message containing 'Error' keyword
Works best with: mist create, mist update, mist delete, mist scale
Validated during 2 weeks of development with ~40 failed provisions
Time saved: Average 15-20 minutes per failed provision (total: 10-16 hours over 2 weeks)
